para.text: Prosecutions of violations of this subchapter shall be brought by the Corporation Counsel in the name of the District of Columbia.

In prosecutions initiated pursuant to this subchapter, a child development facility claiming an exemption from a licensing requirement of this subchapter shall have the burden of proving entitlement to the exemption.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 7-2031.
